description: Submission of a detailed method statement and schedule of works covering all aspects of the proposal, including, but not limited to, the removal of the existing slates; installation of the proposed solar slates; refurbishment of the front roof with reclaimed and reused slates; and the integration of the solar technology into the existing services, pursuant to Condition 3(A); a detailed method statement covering how the historic fabric of the listed building will be protected during all stages of the proposed works, pursuant to Condition 3(B); details regarding the long-term upkeep and maintenance of the proposed solar slates, pursuant to Condition 3(C); and full details, including physical samples, of all the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the building, pursuant to Condition 4 of listed building consent reference: 2025/00329/LBC dated 30th April 2025.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
